Pre-Game Insights: India had to make do with a share of the spoils from their meeting against Afghanistan, which ended goalless at the Damac Club Stadium on Thursday evening.
India's record goalscorer Sunil Chhetri is expected to lead the line in this one and would become only the 41st male player in history to reach 150 international caps.
Afghanistan will be without several key players who are currently taking a stand against the Afghanistan Football Federation due to alleged corruption.
Ashley Westwood's men will now seek to kickstart their World Cup qualifying journey, which has been underwhelming to say the least so far.
